::Cygnar::
    "Hmm.  There are only the Destron base and this other base on the North 
American continent."  He points to the Chivtron base.  "But I don't know much 
about it.  As for Syria, yes that base has been refurbished.  It's good or 
better than new.  There might be a slight problem with attacking the 
Predacons though.  It became impractical while you were gone so Ramjet and I 
made a treaty with them."
